ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful for the help of our colleagues, A. Reif, A. Meyer, Y. Zheng, H. Besser, and M. Kapitz for their technical support and assistance in laser processing, material characterization, and battery analyses. In addition, we would like to acknowledge equipment support in the slurry mixing from W. Bauer and U. Kaufmann.
